hero.title: Support, motivation, and clarity — when you need it most
hero.subtitle: Mindra is a supportive AI companion that helps you talk things through, stay grounded, and gently move forward. Chat, goals, habits, reminders, premium voice, and face-to-face calls — all in one place.
features.title: What Mindra helps you with
features.cards.chat.title: Supportive chat
features.cards.chat.text: Warm, calm conversations when you feel overwhelmed, tired, or alone.
features.cards.coach.title: Gentle guidance
features.cards.coach.text: Small steps, reflections, and check-ins to help you regain focus.
features.cards.goals.title: Goals & habits
features.cards.goals.text: Set goals, build habits, and track progress without pressure.
features.cards.reports.title: Progress awareness
features.cards.reports.text: Understand patterns, consistency, and momentum over time.
features.cards.voice.title: Premium voice
features.cards.voice.text: Natural voice replies and calming audio for deeper presence.
features.cards.premium.title: Face-to-face calls
features.cards.premium.text: When text isn’t enough — talk directly and feel supported.
support.title: Why Mindra exists
support.intro: Mindra was created for moments when life feels heavy — burnout, stress, loneliness, or loss of direction. It’s not about fixing you. It’s about being there.
support.goal.title: Our mission
support.goal.text: To offer consistent, respectful, and human-like support — without judgment, pressure, or expectations.
support.features.1: A calm place to talk things through.
support.features.2: Tools to gently structure life when everything feels messy.
support.features.3: Presence that doesn’t disappear when things get hard.
support.desc: Questions or concerns? Reach out — we reply as soon as possible.
